document.full_text: the obama administration has full confidence in senior leadership at the federal aviation administration following a string of highly publicized lapses by air traffic controllers, including one this week involving a plane carrying first lady michelle obama.
document.title: transport secretary lahood has full confidence in faa
lines_and_colors: the obama administration has full confidence in senior leadership at the federal aviation administration following a string of highly publicized lapses by air traffic controllers, including one this week involving a plane carrying first lady michelle obama.
